meanings.definition: A person or entity that transfers something from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The transferrers moved the boxes to the new warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The company hired professional transferrers to relocate their office.
meanings.sent3: The group of transferrers joked about racing to see who could move the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The transferrers were like busy bees, buzzing from one location to another.
meanings.sent5: The skilled transferrers made the task look effortless as they carried the heavy furniture.

meanings.definition: The act of transferring something from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The transferrers of goods ensured everything arrived safely at the destination.
meanings.sent2: The transferrers of funds completed the transaction smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The ballet of the transferrers gracefully moved the items across the stage.
meanings.sent4: The concept of time became a swift transferrers between past and present.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the train was a constant reminder of the transferrers of passengers along the tracks.
